item.description: Our October meetup had a great turn out with some really happy, playful dogs! What a nice day it was outside, hopefully our November meetup will have such luck! Come join us for another fun Saturday afternoon for the dogs. I am concerned with what the weather will be like in mid November, but don't worry - there is a huge inside room that we can use if it is too cold outside. Any friendly dog is welcome, so tell your friends too! We hope to see you there!

group.name: The Greater Boston Active Dogs Meetup Group

item.name: November Meetup!
